name: CGDD4303 Concrete Formwork Simulator
description:
During the assembly you will need to move camera

Click and hold right mouse button to rotate the camera and target where you want to look at

Use the arrow keys to fly the camera left, forward, right, backwards.

Rotate a preview Item with R

Delete built items by holding D and left clicking which item to delete

Left mouse click inventory slots to select an item to build. Drag the item to a preview and try and snap it into the correct position.
